pages.text: The $(mob)Mandragora$() is monster that spawns when a player walks over or attacks a $(l:grimoireofgaia_cyan_flower)$(mob)Cyan Flower$(). It is immune to $(thing)Poison$() and $(thing)knockback$(), but is vulnerable to Fire and shovels. If a $(mob)Mandragora$() is spawned from a player step, it is passive unless provoked. If a player attacks the $(mob)Mandragora$() or the $(mob)Cyan Flower$() that spawned it, it retaliates with melee attacks and an aura including $(thing)Slowness$(), $(thing)Night Vision$(), and $(thing)Nausea$().

$(mob)Mandragora$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
$(mob)Mandragora$() drop $(item)Garden Gnomes$() on death, which can be right-clicked and placed on the ground as a decoration.
